section.p:
The provides detailed instructions for performing the following upgrades:
Micro upgrades, from version 1.2.x to version
Minor upgrades, from version 1.1.x to version
customers: This guide does not include procedures for upgrading a high-availability deployment. For additional information, please contact your representative.

section.title: Supported clients and browsers
section.p: The following table identifies the supported combinations of client operating systems and web browsers.

section.title: Change history
section.p: The following list associates document part numbers and the important changes to this guide since the previous release. Some of the changes involve features or content, but others do not. For information about new or changed features, refer to the .

dlentry.dd: Add sections for configuring dnsmasq and removing consistent network device naming.
Simplify Docker Engine install and configuration steps.
Add sections about the maintenance scripts that are installed.
Add a chapter of details about releases and upgrades.
Create a part for the minor release upgrade chapters.
Add a part and new chapters for micro release upgrades.
Add steps to download and use the serviced RPM file ( customers only).
Add a procedure for updating ZooKeeper images on offline nodes ( customers only).
Clarify the procedures for stopping a cluster.
Add a description of a new feature, setting the connection timeout value of a resource pool, to the pre-upgrade chapter.
Add a procedure for the new feature to the post-upgrade chapter.
